name: Phone
description: A cutting-edge smartphone featuring a powerful A16 Bionic chip, a pro-level camera system with cinematic mode, and a durable ceramic shield front. It offers exceptional performance for gaming, photography, and everyday tasks.

name: Laptop
description: A high-performance notebook designed for creative professionals. It features the M2 Pro chip, a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 18 hours of battery life. Perfect for video editing, graphic design, and coding on the go.

name: Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation, providing an immersive listening experience. They feature a comfortable, ergonomic design and offer exceptional sound quality for music, podcasts, and calls.

name: Tablet
description: A versatile and lightweight tablet with a stunning 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display and the A14 Bionic chip. It's ideal for multitasking, creative projects, and entertainment, with support for the Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Smartwatch
description: A rugged and capable smartwatch built for adventure and endurance athletes. It features an advanced GPS system, a durable titanium case, and a longer battery life, along with comprehensive health and fitness tracking features.
